---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /staking/polkadot/add-staking-proxy/get-flow-status-registered
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://polkadot-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/5d2a7dc6-0f7c-41a5-bbb6-fb27b2e16a9b' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `add_proxy_tx_broadcasting` to `registered`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {4,13-14}
{
  "id": "5d2a7dc6-0f7c-41a5-bbb6-fb27b2e16a9b",
  "operation": "add_proxy",
  "state": "registered",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "proxy_account_address": "5HDojdfR1Vm9dnDYEB4JQyxgcgH3aHHeWgE9jqarBkChULRJ",
    "proxied_account_address": "5FNVfA6qhVJBKrG4KCo6CLzvcXVRRdiGpsYHbkzujMUG6JJG",
    "add_proxy_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "0x160100e41e2a54397e0657cb58d978d0f2a9201a84b3d953a83780df5795a1006ecf7d0200000000000800a424000013000000e143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423ee143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423e",
      "signed": "0x3902840092460dcf0b9ae6cabf654c1b33f02f52934d1ae262f8db733b470b631c5871650168412eb87861dfec907b59f82abc2bd30f8e79b03d899af35a0edb2c250d797238e124dc5beffb808f10f397b89116262f96f3d138483a094e0b5b9032394b88000800160100e41e2a54397e0657cb58d978d0f2a9201a84b3d953a83780df5795a1006ecf7d0200000000",
      "hash": "0xb1460239a2a02c504aff2482d0461454f0a4c73033f14f5b96827a8d6f7b464e",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [],
      "block_time": "2023-02-28T19:28:25.384Z",
      "block_number": 14838472,
      "proxy": null
    }
  },
  "network_code": "polkadot",
  "chain_code": "westend",
  "created_at": "2023-02-28T19:11:38.281Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-28T19:28:25.394Z"
}
```

### Staking Proxy Flow Complete

Congratulations, you've successfully added a staking proxy and are ready to move to the next step of delegation!
